asset.notes: * Added kode80CloudShadows component (add to directional light) * Added AssetUpdater (Window/kode80/Check for Asset Updates) * Hardcoded input in demo's FlyCamera script (fixes Input Manager errors) * Fixed compile errors for < Unity 5.3.3 * Fixed lighting when project is set to Gamma * Updated documentation
